climbs.name: Chevy's Chimney
climbs.fa: Roy Suggett, Marilla Lamb, & Mitch Yaggie

content.description:
There are some large disconcerting blocks to negotiate. The rock is soft and the colors are splendid.  The chimney at the top is without gear until the very end.  Here you will find a connected pocket(s).  Sling this for your only pro in the chimney.

There was (some body in the register absconded with this piece of history) a fixed pin about half way up.  This is the only sign of any activity. We do not know if this was where they bailed from, or, being that there was no anchor on the summit, what went on. If I am contacted regarding the details, I will gladly give up the FA.
content.protection: See photo and bring lots of runners. You will find what you need on top.
content.location: West side of second tower in obvious maw.
